description: This Java source file defines a SimpleTokenService class that provides in-memory token management functions for issuing, validating, and revoking tokens, primarily for demonstration purposes within a security package of a notes application backend.

classes.name: SimpleTokenService
classes.description: A simple in-memory token service for demo purposes, capable of issuing, validating, and revoking tokens associated with user IDs.

methods.name: issueToken
methods.description: Generates and issues a new token associated with the provided user UUID, using secure random bytes encoded in Base64.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Checks if the provided token is valid by returning the associated user UUID, or null if invalid.

methods.name: revoke
methods.description: Revokes the provided token by removing it from the internal token-to-user map.
